Globetrotter

06 Aug 2012

[caption id="attachment_37021" align="aligncenter" width="512"] Globetrotter - A game to learn cities and countries[/caption] Go to the Game: Globetrotter XL on Kongregate Task: Find a city on a map How to play: You're given the name of a city and its country and a map. In the first levels this map has borders, but no names of countries or cities. In the later levels even the borders are not shown. My Record: Level 6, about 1400 points
